workshoptitle: Get started with Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Data Catalog

tutorials.title: Get started with Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Data Catalog
tutorials.description: Get started with Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Data Catalog, learn the basics!

tutorials.title: Lab 0: Prerequisites
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through the Prerequisites for Data Catalog workshop

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Create a data catalog
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through the steps required for you to create a Data Catalog instance

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Harvest metadata from Autonomous Database
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through the steps of how to Harvest the metadata from Databases.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Harvest metadata from  Oracle Object Storage
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to Harvest the metadata from Oracle Object Storage.

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Create a Business Glossary and Custom Property
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to associate business terms to the metadata.

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Enrich metadata
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to define some additional information to the metadata

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Search and Discover your data
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to Search, filter and discover your data.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
